problem_type: Two-step: Student partitions into thirds/sixths, then labels positions
workspace_description: Step 1: Blank 0-1 number line for partitioning into thirds. Step 2: After partition validated, label palette appears with fractions: 0, 1/3, 2/3, 1.
action_description: Student first places tick marks to partition the line (step 1), then drags fraction labels to all tick positions (step 2).
prompt: Divide this line into thirds, then label each position.

problem_type: Two-step: Student partitions into thirds/sixths, then labels positions
workspace_description: Step 1: Blank 0-1 number line for partitioning into sixths. Step 2: After partition validated, label palette appears with fractions: 0, 1/6, 2/6, 3/6, 4/6, 5/6, 1.
action_description: Student first places tick marks to partition the line (step 1), then drags fraction labels to all tick positions (step 2).
prompt: Make sixths, then add the labels.

workspace_description: Step 1: Blank 0-1 number line for partitioning into thirds. Step 2: After partition validated, label palette appears with fractions: 0, 1/3, 2/3, 1.
action_description: Student first places tick marks to partition the line (step 1), then drags fraction labels to all tick positions (step 2).
prompt: First create equal spaces, then show the fractions.

problem_type: Two-step: Student partitions into thirds/sixths, then labels positions
workspace_description: Step 1: Blank 0-1 number line for partitioning into thirds. Step 2: After partition validated, label palette appears with fractions: 0, 1/3, 2/3, 1.

problem_type: Two-step: Student partitions extended line, then labels positions including beyond 1
workspace_description: Step 1: Blank 0-2 number line with only endpoints labeled (0, 1, 2). Step 2: After partition validated, label palette appears with fractions 4/3, 5/3, 6/3, 7/3 for labeling positions beyond 1.
action_description: Student first places tick marks to partition the 0-2 line (step 1), then drags fraction labels to positions beyond 1 (step 2).
prompt: Divide the line from 0 to 1 and from 1 to 2 into thirds, then label the fractions past 1.

problem_type: Two-step: Student partitions extended line, then labels positions including beyond 1
workspace_description: Step 1: Blank 0-2 number line with only endpoints labeled (0, 1, 2). Step 2: After partition validated, label palette appears with fractions 5/4, 6/4, 7/4 for labeling positions beyond 1.
action_description: Student first places tick marks to partition the 0-2 line (step 1), then drags fraction labels to positions beyond 1 (step 2).
prompt: Partition each whole into fourths, then label 5/4, 6/4, and 7/4.

problem_type: Two-step: Student partitions extended line, then labels positions including beyond 1
workspace_description: Step 1: Blank 0-2 number line with only endpoints labeled (0, 1, 2). Step 2: After partition validated, label palette appears with fractions 6/5, 7/5, 8/5, 9/5 for labeling positions beyond 1.
action_description: Student first places tick marks to partition the 0-2 line (step 1), then drags fraction labels to positions beyond 1 (step 2).
prompt: Show fifths from 0 to 1 and from 1 to 2, then add the labels past 1.

problem_type: Two-step: Student partitions extended line, then labels positions including beyond 1
workspace_description: Step 1: Blank 0-2 number line with only endpoints labeled (0, 1, 2). Step 2: After partition validated, label palette appears with fractions 7/6, 8/6, 9/6, 10/6, 11/6 for labeling positions beyond 1.
action_description: Student first places tick marks to partition the 0-2 line (step 1), then drags fraction labels to positions beyond 1 (step 2).
prompt: Make sixths in both sections, then label the positions beyond 1.
